name: Oranges Responsive Landing Page
description:
Ironhack Workshop #6 - Auto-layout & Handoff

Find our proposal for a landing page to promote, Oranges! Feel free to choose another product to market. You can change the theme - colors, typography, icons - but please don't change the layouts. It's for the greater good.

Work Auto-layout to make the desktop version responsive and fluid.  

At the end of the workshop, we'll ask you to export all the needed assets in the correct resolutions and share it with your developer (a.k.a. you next week). Check out the code tab and explore your Figma File with other eyes!
